item.title: Pedestrian killed at Auckland railway crossing
item.description:
A pedestrian has been killed after being struck by a train in Auckland.
A police spokesperson confirmed the person was hit by the train at the crossing on Bruce McLaren Rd, Henderson, about 6.45am.
